result.ga: Tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imithe
result.orig: Tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imithe
result.html: Tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imitheHis hair is almost gone.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ċuid gruaige beagnaċ imiṫeHis hair is almost gone.

result.html: Tá mé beagnach críochnaitheI am almost finished.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé beagnaċ críoċnaiṫeI am almost finished.

result.eng: It's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.
result.ga: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoil
result.orig: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoil
result.html: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoilIt's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé beagnaċ a naoi a ċlog caiṫfiḋ mé dul ar scoilIt's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.

result.ga: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog
result.orig: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog
result.html: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlogIt's almost nine o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé beagnaċ a naoi a ċlogIt's almost nine o'clock.

result.eng: I go to the pub nearly every night!
result.ga: Téim go dtí an teach tábhairne beagnach gach oíche
result.orig: Téim go dtí an teach tábhairne beagnach gach oíche
result.html: Téim go dtí an teach tábhairne beagnach gach oícheI go to the pub nearly every night!
result.ponchtml: Téim go dtí an teaċ táḃairne beagnaċ gaċ oíċeI go to the pub nearly every night!

result.eng: Some ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.
result.ga: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beag
result.orig: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beag
result.html: Beagnach deich mbliana ó shin d'éirigh mé as an leaba in árasán beagSome ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.
result.ponchtml: Beagnaċ deiċ mbliana ó ẛin d'éiriġ mé as an leaba in árasán beagSome ten years ago I got up from bed in a small apartment.
